parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description:
The scenario in which you want to use the image. Valid values:

- CreateEcs (default): instance creation
- ChangeOS: replacement of the system disk or operating system

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The number of vCPUs of the instance type.

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The region ID of the image. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: Details about the instance types that are supported by the image.
